name: Zinc
slogan: 9 months full time programme to build new startups that tackle huge social problems
description:
Zinc builds new companies that tackle the biggest social problems in the developed world. 

We  do this through a 9-month, full-time programme for 50 creative, entrepreneurial individuals who come together at Zinc to start a new business from scratch. They build scalable products and services that target millions of customers, based on the best social science research, exponential technologies and creative design.

Each programme has a specific 'mission'; the first one focused on improving women's and girls' mental and emotional health, and the second, which is currently underway, focuses on unlocking opportunities for people in places that have been hard-hit by globalisation and automation.

Zinc’s third mission is to add five more years of high quality to later life. More details, including why we’ve chosen this mission and 10 key opportunity areas for new businesses, can be found: https://www.zinc.vc/mission-3

team.title: CEO @ Trapeze, Mission 1
team.name: Kim van Haalen
team.bioHtml: Labs Manager @WeWork Labs . Previous @ZincVC, @Salesforce and @GeoPhy

team.title: Entrepreneur-in-Residence at Mission 1
team.name: Hamza Naveed
team.bioHtml: Co-founder at Zinc • Co-founder @ItsyBitsy Studied Global Business & Entrepreneurship at @Indiana University, Bloomington • Studied Software Engineering @Nust

team.name: Billie Quinlan
team.bioHtml: Business, Culture and Sex. Co-Founder and CEO @Ferly , Health Coach, Mission 1 Alum @ZINC. Gave a TEDX talk: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eXuWmuoc1X0

jobs.title: Zinc Company Builder Programme
jobs.description:
Do you want to build a new startup with social impact?

Zinc's nine-month full-time company builder programme brings together 50 talented individuals, domain expertise, insights from social science and a leading network of experts to create new purpose-driven companies.

The Zinc programme differs from other startup incubators/accelerators in that it harnesses the power of a mission to mobilise the best talent, ideas and capital. This year's mission is to rethink ageing and improve the quality of later life - www.zinc.vc/mission-3 

Zinc’s proven programme provides individuals (who we call Founders) with: the opportunity to find a Co-Founder(s); a structured programme that guides Founders through creating the right product, team and business; intensive help with the science, technology, domain expertise, access to users and commercial acumen needed to succeed; a stipend to cover living costs; an attractive co-working space; credits for technical and business services; and the support of a brilliant and diverse cohort of other Founders. 


THE PROGRAMME:

The programme is structured in three phases:

1. Match - where founders choose the focus for their new business, their co-founder and their outline business idea
2. Hatch - where the new teams design, test and improve their new products and services
3. Accelerate - where the new businesses secure the resources they need to achieve their ambitions

The pace at which Founders move through these three phases varies, but on average each phase takes 3 months.


WHO WE LOOK FOR:

We look for creators and innovators from a variety of backgrounds, including clinicians, engineers, financial services experts, creative designers, researchers, serial entrepreneurs, product managers, NGO innovators, life scientists, care managers, and others. 

All the Founders will share a passion to co-found commercial businesses from scratch within one or more of the 10 opportunity areas in Mission 3. 

Founders must demonstrate:
- Ambition and Drive
- Commitment to social impact
- Commercial mindset
- Fresh insight
- Creativity
- Comfort with uncertainty
- Obsession with meeting user needs
- Power to mobilise supporters
- Ability to get things done


BENEFITS:

- Access to potential co-founders
- £12,000 Stipend over 9 months
- Intensive 9 month programme to build a business from scratch
- Up to 12 months workspace in our Central London base- 
- Free services and resources
- Access to leading experts from academia, business, design and technology
- Zinc as a Founding Shareholder in your new company, based on a 8% equity stake

APPLICATION PROCESS:

Applications can be made on our website - https://www.zinc.vc/programme - and will close on 21 July 2019.
